welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brits, South Africa! Prepare to be captivated by the charm of our city, known for its beautiful landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Brits has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal is used for domestic flights within South Africa.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal is used for international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for the first 30 minutes. After that, a fee may apply.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wonderboom Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wonderboom Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pilanesberg Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pilanesberg Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
